title: Ignota's SCP-7998 Pixel Fanart
content:

margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/qbMyMaJ.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7136219725612256558?is_from_webapp=v1&item_id=7136219725612256558 Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7998 Eel Days]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** eeldays.mp4, eeldays.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7136219725612256558?is_from_webapp=v1&item_id=7136219725612256558
> **Derivative of:** SCP-7XXX by AnActualCrow
[[/<]]
-----

This article is cute, friendly, and doesn't overstay it's welcome. I like the characters(De Santi)  the set up, etc. It reminds me of sky high in some weird vague way if sky high didn't have a shitty weird ending, lol. 

I like it! I also like eels, so that helps too.

I kinda got inspired by the fact that the security cameras were mentioned a few times so I did something a little different this time around but not so different that it looks out of place with the others. I feel like it might've been a bit overemphasized but I LIKE IT

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
